name: MLDataValueConvertible
desc: A type that can convert itself to and from a data value.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new default instance of the conforming type when a data value is missing or invalid.

items.name: init?(from: MLDataValue)
items.desc: Creates an instance of the conforming type from a data value.

items.name: var dataValue: MLDataValue
items.desc: The value of the conforming typeâ€™s instance wrapped in a data value.

items.name: static var dataValueType: MLDataValue.ValueType
items.desc: The underlying type the conforming type uses when it wraps itself in a data value.
